This way they don't generate only in the corner of the chunk</comment><next><block type="placement_heightmap"><field name="heightmap">MOTION_BLOCKING</field><comment pinned="false" h="92" w="165">We then move the patches at the highest motion blocking block, so that they generate on the surface</comment><next><block type="placement_biome_filter"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We add a biome filter, so that the patches don't generate outside of the current biome</comment></block></next></block></next></block></next></block><block type="feature_forest_rock" x="1078" y="182"><comment pinned="false" h="70" w="313">This block represent a forest rock, like the ones found in Old Growth Taigas. This feature should be added during the LOCAL_MODIFICATIONS step</comment><value name="block"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="block">Blocks.MOSSY_COBBLESTONE</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block that makes the forest rock.</comment></block></value></block><block type="block_predicate_is_air" x="1150" y="263"></block><block type="placement_count" x="1112" y="352"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We try to generate this feature twice in each chunk</comment><value name="count"><block type="int_provider_constant"><field name="value">2</field></block></value></block><block type="block_predicate_all_of" x="952" y="1118"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="5"></mutation><value name="condition1"><block type="block_predicate_solid"><field name="x">1</field><field name="y">-9</field><field name="z">0</field></block></value><value name="condition2"><block type="block_predicate_solid"><field name="x">-1</field><field name="y">-9</field><field name="z">0</field></block></value><value name="condition3"><block type="block_predicate_solid"><field name="x">0</field><field name="y">-9</field><field name="z">1</field></block></value><value name="condition4"><block type="block_predicate_solid"><field name="x">0</field><field name="y">-9</field><field name="z">-1</field></block></value></block><block type="placement_block_predicate_filter" x="740" y="1382"><value name="condition"><block type="block_predicate_solid"><field name="x">0</field><field name="y">-9</field><field name="z">0</field></block></value></block></xml>
